entities.name: NVIDIA
entities.description: A technology company headquartered at 2788 San Tomas Expressway, Santa Clara, California 95051, U.S.A, responsible for the administration of the Plan.

entities.name: NVIDIA MEXICO
entities.description: A subsidiary of NVIDIA, referred to as NV Computing Mexico, S. de R.L. de C.V., which is the sole service recipient for participants in the Plan.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA is the parent company responsible for the administration of the Plan, while NVIDIA Mexico is the sole service recipient.
